entry.title: $2292 // MASSIVE 1.5 BED HALF BLOCK TO MYRTLE/BRDWAY JMZ
entry.content:
NO FEE 1.5 Bed / 1 Bath Bushwick Brooklyn. 900 square feet, All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle Av. . Bran new construction building just steps from Myrtle/Broadway JMZ trains. Super spacious sun drenched 1.5 bed with huge bay windows. Post card views of the manhattan skyline. Elevator building with dishwasher,microwave,bike storage and laundry in building. Eight parking spaces and one private storage unit are available. Giant closets and steps to the best night life and food and beverage Brooklyn has to offer. !!!!!
********NO BROKERS FEE*********

entry.title: $2350 // Large bedrooms with enough room for queen sized beds
entry.content:
2 Bed / 2 Bath on St Nicholas Ave in Bushwick, Brooklyn. No Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: DeKalb Av. True 2 bedroom, 2 full bath just a few blocks from the Jefferson L train! Large bedrooms with enough room for queen sized beds and all your other furniture! Rooms on opposite sides of the apartment and each room has a private entrance. Separate living room and separate kitchen! Stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave. Prime Bushwick! This one is dope!


Move in Costs: First and Security
Credit: Healthy
Available:Now
Fee: No Fee
